overview: A visual and oral history which profiles 5 colorful characters - all gay men with an affinity for historic architecture, a flair for living life to it's fullest, and a multitude of great stories about their escapades in 1970's San Francisco. Each contributes to the preservation of San Francisco's architectural and stylistic legacy in a different and vital way.
tagline: Five eccentric gay men and their dedication to preserving the past.
title: The Pure Eccentrics: San Francisco
